definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时将近结束，大家可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: The Beijing South Railway Station sees around fifty thousand passengers departing every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京南站每天有将近5万客流量。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 将近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平处于贫困线以下。

sentences.english: Although had been in Shengzhou for close to ten years now, I had never been to Beizhang Mountain and passing there.
sentences.chinese: 到剡县也有将近十年了，可从没去过或路过北璋山。

sentences.english: That alone will cost you nearly $4444 a year.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅这样每年就会花费你将近4444美元。

sentences.english: Nearly 200 of the CEOs have no graduate-level degree.
sentences.chinese: 而将近有200位CEO没有硕士学位。

sentences.english: We both looked with our mouths open for about five minutes before we said a word.
sentences.chinese: 我们张着嘴巴互相看着对方将近五分钟，无言而语。

sentences.english: Losses are estimated at close to one million US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 损失估计达到了将近一百万美元。

sentences.english: The five-day trip was wonderful and it covered nearly 1, 500km.
sentences.chinese: 五天的旅游很精彩，行程将近1，500公里。

sentences.english: Almost 170 vessels have been held up at the Zhuzhou section in the river's upper reaches.
sentences.chinese: 将近170艘船停在株洲地区，湘江河的上游河段。

sentences.english: Nearly 20% of the bales were broken and the contents badly soiled.
sentences.chinese: 将近20%的包都破了，包内的货物严重污损。

sentences.english: Nestlé sales for 2010 were almost CHF 110 bn.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢2010年销售总额将近110亿瑞士法郎。

sentences.english: Conklin estimated that Travis weighed nearly 200 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 康克林估计特拉维斯将近有200磅重。

sentences.english: The city has a population of nearly 1,000,000.
sentences.chinese: 那个城市的人口将近一百万。

sentences.english: It would take nearly 1, 700 years for beer to make its reemergence in China.
sentences.chinese: 直到将近1700年之后，啤酒才再次回到中国。

sentences.english: They were both almost eighty-seven years old.

definition: to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
